item.description:
10 YouTube essentials: The ‘What Next’ for Video Marketing.

Join the Boston Internet Marketing Meetup as part of the FutureM Conference and learn the essentials of effectively marketing your videos. Video use is exploding and YouTube is expected to become the biggest search resource by early 2011.

You’ll take away the how-to’s for setting up your YouTube channel, proper keyword usage and effective ‘call to action’ strategies that help make your video marketing work!

The Session Includes a FREE 'Top 10 Video Marketing Tips' Handout and access to a downloadable E-Book.

We'll also cover many of the basics for best camera's, sound, lighting, editing, music and many additional resources.
item.name: Fast Start Video - “ You’ve made your video, Now What?”
